kpis.label: Title Character Usage
kpis.description: Percentage of title character limit used (30 chars for iOS, 50 for Android)

kpis.label: Subtitle Character Usage
kpis.description: Percentage of subtitle character limit used (30 chars for iOS, 80 for Android)

kpis.label: Title Word Count
kpis.description: Number of words in title (target: 3-5 for readability)

kpis.label: Subtitle Word Count
kpis.description: Number of words in subtitle (target: 4-6 for optimal coverage)

kpis.label: Title Token Density
kpis.description: Ratio of meaningful tokens to total tokens in title

kpis.label: Subtitle Token Density
kpis.description: Ratio of meaningful tokens to total tokens in subtitle

kpis.label: Title High-Value Keywords
kpis.description: Count of high-value keywords (relevance >= 2) in title

kpis.label: Subtitle Incremental Keywords
kpis.description: Count of new high-value keywords added by subtitle (not in title)

kpis.label: Title Noise Ratio
kpis.description: Ratio of stopwords/filler to total tokens in title

kpis.label: Subtitle Noise Ratio
kpis.description: Ratio of stopwords/filler to total tokens in subtitle

kpis.label: Title Generic Combos
kpis.description: Number of generic discovery combos in title

kpis.label: Title Branded Combos
kpis.description: Number of branded combos in title

kpis.label: Subtitle Incremental Generic Combos
kpis.description: Number of new generic combos added by subtitle

kpis.label: Low-Value Combo Ratio
kpis.description: Ratio of low-value combos to total combos

kpis.label: Semantic Language-Verb Pairs
kpis.description: Count of semantic pairs like 'learn spanish', 'speak french' in title

kpis.label: Total Unique Keyword Coverage
kpis.description: Total unique meaningful keywords across title and subtitle

kpis.label: Title Hook Strength
kpis.description: Strength of opening hook in title (0-100): action verbs + benefits + specificity

kpis.label: Subtitle Hook Strength
kpis.description: Strength of opening hook in subtitle (0-100): action verbs + benefits + specificity

kpis.label: Specificity Score
kpis.description: Presence of concrete objects, goals, or outcomes (0-100)

kpis.label: Benefit Density
kpis.description: Ratio of benefit-oriented tokens to meaningful tokens

kpis.label: Redundancy Penalty
kpis.description: Penalty for repeated low-value words (0 = no redundancy, 100 = high redundancy)

kpis.label: Brand Presence in Title
kpis.description: Strength of brand presence in title (0-1)

kpis.label: Brand Presence in Subtitle
kpis.description: Strength of brand presence in subtitle (0-1)

kpis.label: Brand Combo Ratio
kpis.description: Ratio of brand combos to total combos

kpis.label: Generic Discovery Combo Ratio
kpis.description: Ratio of generic discovery combos to total combos

kpis.label: Overbranding Indicator
kpis.description: Flag (0/1) indicating if metadata is too brand-heavy (brand combos > 70% of total)

kpis.label: Urgency Signal
kpis.description: Presence of urgency words (now, today, instantly) - low weight as can be spammy

kpis.label: Social Proof Signal
kpis.description: Presence of social proof indicators (millions, trusted, top, best)

kpis.label: Benefit Keyword Count
kpis.description: Count of explicit benefit-oriented keywords

kpis.label: Action Verb Density
kpis.description: Ratio of action verbs to total meaningful tokens

kpis.label: Title Intent Alignment
kpis.description: Alignment with primary search intent (0-100)

kpis.label: Subtitle Intent Alignment
kpis.description: Alignment with primary search intent (0-100)

kpis.label: Navigational Intent Bias
kpis.description: Strength of navigational (brand-focused) intent (0-100)

kpis.label: Generic Discovery Bias
kpis.description: Strength of generic discovery (informational/commercial) intent (0-100)
